==Possible Translation==
To the "Darknight Hero"<br />
The Abyss Order has endured too long your self-proclaimed righteousness and hypocrisy. We hereby challenge you:<br />
We shall assault and march full-on onto Mondstadt's front gate at ten. If you wish to cling to your so-called justice, don't sit idly by in the shadows, step up and accept our challenge. Otherwise, Mondstadt's common folk shall take the fall in your stead.
